!Sentinel Trionell: May the twinkle of starlight become a beautiful song that wholly fills your soul. I am Trionell, one of the sentinels who guard the Elven Forest. This place is the *Neutral Zone* which was made when the Elves and Dark Elves signed a peace agreement. [npc_%objectId%_Chat 1|Ask about the Neutral Zone] [npc_%objectId%_Quest|Quest]
